author: violetagg
msg: ISE is expected when using AsyncChannels. Handle it the same way an IOException is handled rather than expecting the client code to catch and handle it.

author: violetagg
msg: Clearer handling of exceptions when calling a method on a POJO based WebSocket endpoint. Based on a suggestion by Eugene Chung.

author: violetagg
msg: Add session ID to the exception message to aid debugging.
